nodes.text: A Pantoran vendor was present in Ord Mantell City on Ord Mantell during Clone Force 99's stay on that planet. Wrecker and Omega would purchase Mantell Mix from them as a treat for successfully completing missions. The two did not pay for the Mantell Mix directly with credits, but rather purchased it on Cid's tab, eventually amassing a debt of over twenty cartons of the snack.
